articles.description: Elly De La Cruz took baseball by storm as a human highlight reel. Now, the 6-foot-5 shortstop and his team are looking to turn all that style into a little more substance﻿.
articles.content: When Cincinnati Reds shortstop Elly De La Cruz burst onto the scene a season ago, his every move became an instant highlight reel. He helped reenergize a fan base starving for a winner by displaying … [+5487 chars]

articles.title: Guard? Pass-rusher? Trade? Answering Dolphins burning draft questions - ESPN
articles.description: With no picks in the third or fourth round, Miami needs to make hay early and late in the 2024 NFL draft.
articles.content:
MIAMI -- At long last, draft day.
